medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent fevers up to 102, early satiety, occasional nausea, and constipation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began about a week ago, including intermittent fevers, early satiety, occasional nausea, and constipation. Reports intermittent lower abdominal pain after eating, which improves with bowel movements. Had a bowel movement yesterday and passing flatus. Currently no abdominal pain, but did experience a small episode of 'phlegmy' emesis in the ED. No nausea currently. Additionally, reports a cough productive of white sputum.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Diabetes type II; 2. Hypertension; 3. Dyslipidemia; 4. Myocardial infarction status post stent; 5. Malignant melanoma of the left upper chest status post resection; 6. End-stage renal disease secondary to diabetic nephropathy, on hemodialysis; 7. Status post renal transplant; 8. Status post thyroidectomy.
